name: Rainbow Combow
description: This iconic Rainbow Combo is the perfect party combination...  We call it our Rainbow Combo party favorite.

name: Great Party Package | Papa Bear Popcorn Trio Delights
description: This tri-pack Papa Bear treat comes in three side-by-side gummy bear flavors, also known as the The Three Little Bears

name: Snickers Candy Mix Popcorn Favorites
description: This candy popcorn mix is everyone's favorite. It comes in a separately wrapped party twin pack of caramel popcorn with a chocolatey snickers mix. We call it Muddy Marble-icious.
